message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.GT, cs.CV, cs.NE 

This paper proposes modifications to the Monte Carlo Softmax Search algorithm for learning positional evaluation functions. The algorithm is used in game playing, which falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses learning methods such as supervised learning, reinforcement learning, and regression learning, which are commonly used in machine learning (cs.LG). The paper compares the Monte Carlo Softmax Search to minimax search, which is a common algorithm used in game theory (cs.GT). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of search trees, which are commonly used in computer vision (cs.CV) and neural networks, which are commonly used in neural engineering (cs.NE).
